alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 25 at 2:47PM MDT until April 25 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow continues through the evening with additional accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Storm total snowfall of 14 to 20 inches, mainly over the southern half of the Wind River Range. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Visibility could be reduced at times along Wyoming Highway 28 from Red Canyon over South Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coverage and intensity of snow will decrease from late afternoon through Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
